resources.string: "Thank you for purchasing Diagnosis Pro and supporting my work! "

"This Unlocker enables the additional features in the free version of Diagnosis.
Starting the Unlocker is not necessary and will just show this explanation.
NOTE: The unlocker needs to stay installed, but you can hide the icon from your app list/menu by pressing the button (might need device restart).
Further questions? Email me! support@thedarken.eu
Now proceed by launching Diagnosis. "
